aria-label.description: Adds an accessible name to the page group when the hasOverflowScroll prop is set to true.

children.description: Content rendered inside of the PageGroup (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes to apply to the PageGroup

hasOverflowScroll.description: Flag indicating if the PageGroup has a scrolling overflow

hasShadowBottom.description: Modifier indicating if PageGroup should have a shadow at the bottom

hasShadowTop.description: Modifier indicating if PageGroup should have a shadow at the top

isFilled.description: Enables the page group to fill the available vertical space if true, or disable filling if false.

stickyOnBreakpoint.description: Modifier indicating if the PageBreadcrumb is sticky to the top or bottom at various breakpoints
